mapper.select: select id, artistId, category, REPLACE(JSON_EXTRACT(title,"$.title"),'"','') title, SUBSTR( JSON_EXTRACT(content,"$.content"),2,(CHAR_LENGTH(JSON_EXTRACT(content,"$.content"))-2) ) content, TRIM(SUBSTRING(date,1,10)) date from (select row_number() over(order by id) no, an.id, an.artist_id artistId, an.category category, an.title title, an.content content, an.date date from artist_notice as an where artist_id = #{param1}) as notice where notice.no > #{param2} order by date desc limit 10;

select id, artist_id artistId, category, REPLACE(JSON_EXTRACT(title,"$.title"),'"','') title, SUBSTR( JSON_EXTRACT(content,"$.content"),2,(CHAR_LENGTH(JSON_EXTRACT(content,"$.content"))-2) ) content, TRIM(SUBSTR(date,1,10)) date from artist_notice where id =#{noticeId};
